presets.label: Timeless Heritage
presets.style: Dark Academia, moody chiaroscuro, rich shadows, 35mm film grain
presets.texture: Old library leather book cover details
presets.decoration: Heritage crest watermark (embossed) and subtle dust motes
presets.memory: Echoes in the hallway, the weight of the gown, and the promise that tradition is just the beginning.

presets.label: Golden Hour Nostalgia
presets.style: Analog film photography, warm Kodak Portra tones, sun flares
presets.texture: Sun-dappled concrete wall with ivy shadows
presets.decoration: Dappled sunlight through tree leaves and soft haze
presets.memory: Laughter on the lawns, sunsets we thought would last forever, and the friends who became family.

presets.label: Modern Minimalist
presets.style: Clean architectural photography, bright airy lighting, sharp focus
presets.texture: Brushed aluminum metal and matte paper
presets.decoration: Abstract geometric light leaks and clean lines
presets.memory: Defined by innovation, driven by coffee, and ready to design the future.

presets.label: Royal Convocation
presets.style: Royal portraiture, warm studio lighting, velvet tones, high definition
presets.texture: Velvet fabric darkness with warm bokeh
presets.decoration: Subtle falling gold confetti (out of focus)
presets.memory: A crowning moment of effort, standing tall among giants, illuminated by shared success.

presets.label: Bohemian Sunset
presets.style: Soft ethereal dreamscape, pastel tones, bloom effect
presets.decoration: Scattered flower petals and soft glowing fairy lights
presets.memory: Wild hearts, messy notes, and the beautiful chaos of finding our own path.

presets.label: The Archive
presets.style: Vintage sepia, scratched film texture, 1920s archive aesthetic
presets.texture: Aged vellum blended with soft architectural blur
presets.decoration: Faded vintage stamps and handwritten script overlay
presets.memory: Written in the history books, sealed with a handshake, a story for the ages.

presets.label: City of Dreams
presets.style: High-contrast editorial fashion, sharp flash, vibrant night
presets.texture: Night skyline haze and bokeh lights
presets.memory: Bright lights, sleepless nights, and the electric feeling of the world waiting for us.

presets.label: Campus Gardens
presets.style: Natural light cinema, macro details, fresh atmosphere
presets.decoration: Elegant silk ribbons drifting in the wind
presets.memory: Growth in every season, roots deep in this ground, blooming where we are planted.
